description: [ANDROMEDA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1074) can establish persistence by dropping a sample of itself to `C:\ProgramData\Local Settings\Temp\mskmde.com` and adding a Registry run key to execute every time a user logs on.(Citation: Mandiant Suspected Turla Campaign February 2023)

external_references.description: Hawley, S. et al. (2023, February 2). Turla: A Galaxy of Opportunity. Retrieved May 15, 2023.
